ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds
¾ cup brown sugar, or to taste

cookingTips: Use toothpicks to secure bacon and prevent unraveling during baking
Arrange smokies on baking sheet and sprinkle with brown sugar before baking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy and sugar is caramelized
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain this classic appetizer combination and help the user understand the caramelization process for best flavor.
